DOC.brief_summary: This randomized, placebo-controlled, double-blind study evaluates the efficacy and tolerability of Ulmus macrocarpa water extract for immunity improvement in relatively healthy adults. 58 subjects received 500 mg of Ulmus macrocarpa water extract per day or a placebo for 4 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: Immunity Improvement Effect of Ulmus Macrocarpa Water Extract in Adults
DOC.criteria: subject has peripheral white blood cells between 4,000/Ul and 8,000/Ul History of renal disease History of diabetes mellitus History of immune disease
